document.full_text: a u.n. scientific body said on monday it would study the radiation impact of japan's nuclear disaster on people and the environment, but it did not expect to detect any major health effects.
document.title: u.n. body to probe fukushima radiation impact
lines_and_colors: a u.n. scientific body said on monday it would study the radiation impact of japan's nuclear disaster on people and the environment, but it did not expect to detect any major health effects.
